title: I bought Google pixel 4a, it has an issue while using my Airtel SIM in it, please fix it shortly.
content: I have been using Airtel sim card since years, but when I insert the same in this phone it does not work, I have tried changing my sim card 2-3 times, but later I recognised the problem is of phone and not of sim, because the same Sim Card works properly in other Phone, hope you will fix the problem timely.
